alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:31PM EDT until June 22 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR WESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chipley, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chipley, Cottondale, Alford, Steele City, Richter Crossroads, Jacob City, Kynesville, Cottondale Airport, Jacobs, Bahoma and Round Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
